posts.description: Off-White’s Virgil Abloh Is the Creative Director Everyone Wants to Be | GQ
posts.extended: A decade ago, every scrappy young kid orbiting the music industry with a heart full of hustle and a head full of rap lyrics wanted to be a CEO, like Jay Z or Diddy. Today they all want to be a creative director. Well, really they want to be Virgil Abloh.
A recent Thursday found me and a male friend huddled over his iPhone. It was 11 a.m. sharp, and the men’s skate-clothing label Supreme was having its weekly drop of new merchandise.

posts.description: Slicing Into a Point-of-Sale Botnet — Krebs on Security
posts.extended: Last week, KrebsOnSecurity broke the news of an ongoing credit card breach involving CiCi’s Pizza, a restaurant chain in the United States with more than 500 locations.
